attributes.action: Include a 'none of the above' slot on all voting slips
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To encourage people to vote offer a none of the above option should no candidate appeal. If 'none of the above' wins the greatest vote, a new ballot should be held with all new candidates.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
